displayName.value: Azure Security Benchmark - Platform Identity (Audit Mode)

assignmentDescription.value: Azure Security Benchmark v3 assigned to Platform Identity management group in audit-only mode. Focuses on identity and access management controls for platform identity resources including Entra ID, Key Vault, and privileged access workloads.

value.message: Platform identity resource is not compliant with Azure Security Benchmark v3. Review identity and access management controls and implement required security configurations.
